bill_title: restore the chief agent of the Division of Criminal Investigation to a former position under certain circumstances.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to restore the chief agent of the Division of Criminal Investigation or the superintendent of the Highway Patrol or their deputies to a former position under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 3-6D be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If the chief agent of the Division of Criminal Investigation of the attorney general's office, the superintendent of the highway patrol, the deputy chief agent, or the deputy superintendent, who prior to the person's appointment served in the ranks of that office is removed for other than just cause, the person shall be returned to the position or related position which the person held immediately prior to the person's appointment. The rate of pay shall be commensurate with the person's years of service. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
